title: Speed and acc - block speeding up

content.question: The figure shows a box on a horizontal surface. Which of the following best shows velocity <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and acceleration <math alttext="a " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> vectors if the box is moving along the surface to the left with increasing speed?

choices.label: The figure presents two arrows that both point to the left, one labeled v of medium length and the other labeled a of small length.
The figure presents two arrows. One arrow labeled v, of medium length points to the left, and the other arrow labeled a, of small length points to the right.
The figure presents two arrows. One arrow labeled v, of medium length points to the right, and the other arrow labeled a, of small length points to the left.
The figure presents an arrow labeled v, of medium length which points to the right. A note indicates that acceleration a equals 0.
The figure presents two arrows that point to the right, one labeled v of medium length and the other labeled a of small length.

content.answer: The figure presents two arrows that both point to the left, one labeled v of medium length and the other labeled a of small length.
